explains: n. 欢宴者，狂欢者；饮酒狂欢者；摆设酒宴者

sentences.en: Caption: DRINKING reveler: a reveler drank during the start of the San Fermin festival in Pamplona, Spain, Monday.
sentences.cn: 描述：节日狂欢：周一，一名男子在西班牙潘普洛纳举行的圣佛明节上开怀畅饮。

sentences.en: We are both powerful now, " says 36-year-old reveler Lee So Jung. " We can celebrate together. " For the Koreans, victory has brought maturity.
sentences.cn: “我们和美国队都是强队，”狂欢人群中36岁的李秀英说：“我们可以一起庆祝胜利”。的确，胜利使韩国人变得更为成熟了。
